text:
Roostify | Sr. DevOps Engineer and Director of DevOps | San Francisco, ONSITE | Full-time

We're looking for Sr DevOps engineers to help us scale an enterprise SaaS product in an AWS environment, and migrating from Ruby to Java. Additionally looking for a technically strong leader to guide the team (currently 5 engineers).

https://www.roostify.com/jobs/

aburnstad@roostify.com
